scripts.mkdirs: mkdir -p dist/core dist/vanilla dist/jquery dist/v0 dist/v1
scripts.copy:examples: bin/preprocess examples/index.html -o index.html & bin/preprocess examples/core.html -o core.html & bin/preprocess examples/vanilla.html -o vanilla.html & bin/preprocess examples/jquery.html -o jquery.html & bin/preprocess examples/v0.html -o v0.html & bin/preprocess examples/v1.html -o v1.html
scripts.copy:html: bin/preprocess src/v0/drawer.html -o dist/v0/drawer.html & bin/preprocess src/v1/drawer.html -o dist/v1/drawer.html
scripts.copy: npm run mkdirs; npm run copy:html & npm run copy:css & npm run copy:examples
scripts.build: npm run copy; npm run build:core & npm run build:vanilla & npm run build:jquery & npm run build:v0 & npm run build:v1
scripts.watch:files: onchange 'src/**/*.html' -- npm run copy:html & onchange 'src/**/*.css' -- npm run copy:css & onchange 'examples/**/*' -- npm run copy:examples
scripts.watch: npm run build; npm run watch:files & npm run watch:core & npm run watch:vanilla & npm run watch:jquery & npm run watch:v0 & npm run watch:v1
scripts.dev: npm run serve & npm run watch
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run clean && npm run build
